review: Surprised what this little thing can do. I got it at a discount so I figured I'd buy it. The one thing I hoped it would do, was to mirror my phone which was playing movies from my WD "MyCloud" over 100 miles away. Receiving data wireless from my MyCloud to my phone then to my phone to the Fire Stick was to much data to transfer. The movie would buffer alot and just wasn't worth it. However mirroring your phone itself is easy (at least with Android in my case). If you want to show pictures and play video content from your phone itself, it does a marvelous job! The only other thing I used was Netflix and that worked very smoothly. Other than that I haven't explored the Fire Stick's full potential. Great buy for the price!

review: This was super easy to set up and start using, and the remote makes it super easy to use. I have another brand, but got this one so I could cast Amazon Instant Video to my main TV and for the same price, think this one beats the competition. We watch Netflix, as well, so this serves all our needs. I highly recommend it!
author: BSM51

review: I bought this when it first went on sale for the glorious price of twenty bucks, not otherwise expecting much out of it in my living room which already features several modern gaming consoles and other streaming devices. But this has quickly become the centerpiece of my media usage. Combined with the Plex app for streaming media from my computers, and the various ambiance apps that can run while playing said media in the background, this has made my living room much livelier. I even bought one for my spouse, and it immediately replaced her Roku.
